summary: Frontend testing completed for Phase 1 PRD System Update. All 6 requested features verified working: Example Output Modal PRD tab renders all 9 collapsible sections correctly, Summary section is expanded by default, clicking collapsed sections expands them, 'See Example Output' button opens modal, Stories tab renders feature/story cards with AC/edge cases, Sprint Plan tab renders kanban board and stats.

issues: Minor: DialogContent missing aria-describedby attribute (console warning)

frontend: Landing page loads with 'See Example Output' button (data-testid='hero-see-example-btn')
Clicking 'See Example Output' button opens ExampleOutputModal
PRD tab is active by default in modal
PRD tab - Summary section renders with Overview, Problem Statement, Goal, Target Users
PRD tab - Summary section is expanded by default (defaultOpen=true)
PRD tab - Context & Evidence section renders with Evidence list, Current Workflow, Why Now
PRD tab - Personas & JTBD section renders with 2 personas badge, persona cards with JTBD, pain points, workarounds
PRD tab - Scope section renders with MVP In, Not Now, Assumptions
PRD tab - Requirements section renders with 3 features badge, feature cards with stories, AC, edge cases
PRD tab - Non-Functional Requirements section renders with Performance, Reliability, Security, Accessibility
PRD tab - Metrics & Analytics section renders with Success Metrics, Guardrails, Instrumentation
PRD tab - Risks section renders with 4 risks badge, risk cards with type, likelihood, impact, mitigation
PRD tab - Open Questions section renders with open count badge, question cards with owner, due date, status
PRD tab - Clicking collapsed section (Context & Evidence) expands it successfully
PRD tab - Copy PRD button exists and is clickable
Stories tab - Feature cards render with Approved badge, story count, points, MoSCoW priority, RICE score
Stories tab - Story cards render with Acceptance Criteria (13 found), Edge Cases (11 found), Notes for Engineering
Stories tab - Found 3 'Must Have' priority badges
Stories tab - Found 6 RICE score badges
Stories tab - Found 12 story point badges
Sprint Plan tab - Sprint 1 header renders with dates (Jan 15-29, 2025)
Sprint Plan tab - Stats row renders: Capacity (15/18), Backlog (0), Ready (3), In Progress (0), Done (0)
Sprint Plan tab - Progress bar shows 35%
Sprint Plan tab - Days Left shows 8
Sprint Plan tab - Kanban board renders 4 columns: Ready, In Progress, Blocked, Done
Sprint Plan tab - Ready column shows 3 story cards with points
Sprint Plan tab - Sprint 2 preview renders with goal and 15 pts
Sprint Plan tab - Velocity note renders at bottom
Generate My Own button in modal header redirects to /signup?next=/new (for non-logged-in users)
Generate My Own button in modal footer exists

critical_code_review_comments: ExampleOutputModal.jsx correctly implements PRDCollapsible component with 9 sections matching PRD JSON structure
PRDCollapsible component uses Radix UI Collapsible with proper state management (useState for isOpen)
Summary section correctly has defaultOpen={true} to be expanded by default
exampleInitiative.json contains comprehensive Senior PM quality PRD with all required sections: summary, context, personas, scope, requirements, nfrs, metrics, risks, open_questions, appendix
PRDPreview.jsx provides reusable StructuredPRDPreview component for JSON format PRDs with markdown export
Backend prd.py has updated LLM prompt for structured JSON PRD generation with detailed schema
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing

success_rate.backend: N/A - backend testing skipped per request

context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 PRD System verified working. ExampleOutputModal uses static JSON from exampleInitiative.json for landing page preview. Backend PRD generation with LLM has been updated but requires active subscription and LLM config to test. PRDPreview.jsx component available for reuse in other parts of the app.

mocked_apis.note: Example Output modal uses static JSON fixture (exampleInitiative.json) - this is by design for landing page preview, not a mock

prd_tab_collapsible_sections.description: All 9 PRD sections render correctly with collapsible behavior: Summary, Context & Evidence, Personas & JTBD, Scope, Requirements, NFRs, Metrics, Risks, Open Questions

summary_expanded_by_default.description: Summary section has defaultOpen={true} and renders expanded showing Overview, Problem Statement, Goal, Target Users

collapsible_expand_on_click.description: Clicking collapsed sections (e.g., Context & Evidence) expands them to show content

see_example_output_button.description: 'See Example Output' button on landing page opens ExampleOutputModal

stories_tab.description: Feature cards render with MoSCoW priority, RICE scores, story points. Story cards show AC, edge cases, engineering notes

sprint_plan_tab.description: Kanban board with 4 columns, stats row (Capacity, Backlog, Ready, In Progress, Done), Sprint 1/2 headers, velocity note
